mapper.insert: insert into movie (movie_id, movie_name, movie_start_time, movie_duration, director, star, introduction, score, poster_image, issuing_region) values (#{movie.movieId}, #{movie.movieName}, #{movie.movieStartTime}, #{movie.movieDuration}, #{movie.director}, #{movie.star}, #{movie.introduction}, #{movie.score}, #{movie.posterImage}, #{movie.issuingRegion})
mapper.select:
select * from movie
movie_id = #{movie.movieId}
and movie_name like #{movie.movieName}
and director like concat('%', #{movie.director}, '%')
and star like concat('%', #{movie.star}, '%')
and issuing_region like concat('%', #{movie.issuingRegion}, '%')
and
movie_start_time <= now()
movie_start_time > now()
mapper.update: update movie set movie_name=#{movie.movieName}, movie_start_time=#{movie.movieStartTime}, movie_duration=#{movie.movieDuration}, director=#{movie.director}, star=#{movie.star}, introduction=#{movie.introduction}, score=#{movie.score}, poster_image=#{movie.posterImage}, issuing_region=#{movie.issuingRegion} where movie_id=#{movie.movieId}
